name: Parallel Charge
description:
well this game was fun and hard to create in just 3 hours e.e

But really love this kind of mechanic, so tell me what do you think? x3

the theme was  "Control more than one"

so what happen if you must complete the energy connection with one, two or four elements at the same time.

Like the tittle said, is a parallel charge, only works if the connection is do it at the same time with all the charges.

Controls

WASD or the ARROWS 

Use some assets that i own and all the creator are credited in the game x3

I wanted to create more levels but the time dont let me, but could be a nice mechanic and game to continue x3
